article_title: Income annuities lose to managed accounts, study finds
article_text:
Managed accounts beat single-premium immediate annuities over the long run.

That’s the conclusion of a study by the Social Science Research Network. Financial advisors usually recommend that people annuitize all or some of their retirement assets so they have some guaranteed income if they live longer than expected.

article_metadata.sailthru.author: Paula Aven Gladych
article_metadata.description: The Social Science Research Network wanted to know whether financial advisors are right in recommending that people annuitize all or some of their retirement assets.

That’s the conclusion of a study by the Social Science Research Network.
Financial advisors usually recommend that people annuitize all or some of their retirement assets so they have some guaranteed income if they live longer than expected.
Managed accounts beat single-premium immediate annuities over the long run.
